Activity

Activity on your Stripe account from May 1, 2025–May 31, 2025, based on the originating event date. Useful to record journal entries for an activity period.

Activity summary

Provides a breakdown by reporting category for your activity, including all transactions except for payouts. Itemized downloads include attribution dates, related charge IDs, customer IDs, etc.
